title: Kitāb al-fatāwá al-ḥadīthīyah / li-Aḥmad Shihāb al-Dīn ibn Ḥajar al-Haytamī al-Makkī. Wa-bi-hāmishihi Kitāb al-Durar al-muntathirah fī al-aḥādīth al-mushtahirah / li-Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī.
author: Ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī, Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad, ca. 1503-ca. 1566.

title: al-Fatāwī al-ḥadīthīyah / li-Aḥmad Shihāb al-Dīn ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī al-Makkī ; wa-bi-hāmishih kitāb al-durar al-muntathirah fī aḥādīth al-mushtahirah ; li-Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī.
author: Ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī, Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad, approximately 1503-approximately 1566.

title: A handbook of early Muhammadan tradition, alphabetically arranged, by A. J. Wensinck.
author: Wensinck, A. J. 1882-1939.
